text: Unroasted green coffee beans. They can be roasted to prepare for brewing.
Freshly roasted beans, full of aroma. Grind them to make coffee grounds. To be ground in the Quern.
Ground roasted coffee beans. Use these in a cooking pot to brew coffee.
A hot drink brewed from roasted coffee grounds. Restores satiety and gives you energy.
A coffee bush. Plant it and tend to it until it flowers and produces ripe beans.
A flowering coffee bush, soon to produce ripe beans.
A ripe coffee bush, ready to harvest beans.
